text: Safety in Numbers is a 1938 American comedy film directed by Malcolm St. Clair and starring Jed Prouty, Shirley Deane and Spring Byington. It was part of Twentieth Century Fox's Jones Family series.Drew p.180 ==Cast== ==References== ==Bibliography== * Bernard A. Drew. Motion Picture Series and Sequels: A Reference Guide. Routledge, 2013. ==External links== * * * Category:1938 films Category:1938 comedy films Category:English-language films Category:American films Category:American comedy films Category:Films directed by Malcolm St. Clair Category:20th Century Fox films Category:American black-and-white films
title: Safety in Numbers (1938 film)
